description:
Today is Sena`s first day of school, and he has to decide if he is going to join the football team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kousoku no Ashi o Motsu Otoko
L`homme aux jambes rapides comme la lumière
L`uomo con le gambe della velocità della luce!
The Man with the Lightspeed Legs!
